description: From a series of 12 lithographs produced for Der Mantel (The Coat) by Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919; a bridge with street lamps curves diagonally from the lower left corner to the upper right corner; in the lower right corner is a body of water with circular ripples
inscription: LL in pencil, below image: 12) | LR of sheet, in pencil: Gogol : der Mantel. / LL of sheet, in pencil: Sonderdruck. / (E.65-II) / E.66-II | LLC in pencil, on verso: 2079
portfolio: From Plate 12 from Der Mantel (The Coat), Nicolai Gogol, Kiepenheuer Verlag, Potsdam-Berlin, 1919
signed: BC in pencil, below image: Walter Gramatté
title: The Kalinkin Bridge, Which is Haunted at Night, Plate 12 from Der Mantel (The Coat)
